post.text: VOTERS, not special interests, WILL BE IN CHARGE. -DJT

comment.author: Casey
comment.text: im so sorry for the way the bullies in minneapolis treated your supporters last night :( dont they realize they are the ones behaving like fascists? footage below from minneapolis last night ;(

replies.author: Casey
replies.text: From the local Wobblies. They are a bunch of thugs! https://www.facebook.com/TC.GDC/posts/1218533214847661

replies.author: Casey
replies.text: Nazis also abused people at their opponents political rallies. Don't These protesters realize they are the ones behaving like nazis? Why were people who spit on and pushed others not arrested for assault?

replies.author: Casey
replies.text: all these videos and photos are from last night's so called 'anti fascist' 'protest' against trump in minneapolis. please spread them! this is the ultimate in orwellian doublespeak. the fascists are claiming to be antifascists, the irony is thick.
